string.value: Despite defeating 20 #o5120503# like #b#p2091000##k asked, #p2091000# still seemed uninterested in making me the Master. Seriously, is he really an instructor? This is really getting on me, and I got to see him now, just to see what he'll ask me to do.

I asked him about being the Master, but #p2091000# gave me this uninterested look and told me to defeat #r40 #o5120503#s#k. First, 10... then 20... now 40? What am I, a training dog? Despite my anger ready to spill over, I realized I couldn't stop now. Fine, I'll do what #p2091000# says.\n\n#o5120503# #r#a38021##k

Despite defeating 40 #o5120503#s, #p2091000# still gave me that uninterested look and just nodded nonchalantly. I mean, he should be giving me some kind of a compliment for doing all that, but instead, #p2091000# iterated that I am still nowhere close to being a Master. Is he really gonna make me the Master?
다들 열심히 훈련하는 것 같군. 좋아. 그래야지. 그래야 선인이 될 수 있지.\r\n#L0# #b… 이제 선인이 될 수 있는 겁니까?
응? 넌 누구지…? 처음 보는 얼굴 같은데?\r\n#L0# #b전에 #o5120503# 10마리를 잡고! 또 #o5120503# 20마리를 더 잡은 사람입니다!
아아~ 그러고 보니 그런 녀석도 있었지. 뭐야? 그럼 아직도 포기하지 않은 거야? 헛. 끈질긴 녀석이구만. 그렇게 선인이 되고 싶은가?
그럼 당장 #o5120503# 40마리를 잡아. …뭘 보고 있어? 빨리 가서 잡으라니까? 못 잡으면 선인은 못 돼!
여기까지 와서 포기하다니, 근성 없는 녀석이로군. 그 정도 근성으로 선인은 절대 될 수 없지.
Good good. Everyone seems to be diligently training. That's exactly how to become the Master.\r\n#L0# #b... now can I become the Master?
Huh? Who are you? I don't think we've ever met.\r\n#L0# #bWhat? I defeated 10 #o5120503#s before, then I went ahead and defeated 20 more #o5120503#s! At your order!!
Ahhh, I see. I guess I said that before? What? So you haven't given up on it yet? Hmmm ... you are indeed persistent... do you REALLY want to become the Master?
Then defeat #r40 #o5120503#s#k immediately. What are you waiting for? Do it now! You can't become the Master if you don't do it!
You're giving up right now? After all that? You must be a quitter, then. I don't see any Master around here that has NO persistence like you.

Hoh ... you really defeated 40 #o5120503#s. You really don't let go, do you? This is sickening... but then again, one must be persistent like you in order to become the Master. In that case, I commend you.

You have now passed the 1st stage of becoming the Master. This does not warrant you becoming the Master, but this should at least qualify you to become... um... a Junior Master. Becoming the true Master requires much much more training, so I suggest you keep doing what you're doing and keep up the effort.
You haven't defeated #r40 #o5120503#s#k? The road to becoming the Master is treacherous, and you should be able to endure this, no problem.
